title: Optimistic Constrained Online Convex Optimization for Resource Reservation in Tactile Internet
authors: Yu Yeh, Vineeth S Varma, Salah E Elayoubi
abstract: This paper addresses the resource reservation problem in Tactile Internet applications by proposing an optimistic constrained online convex optimization (OCCO) framework. We develop algorithms that leverage future information to improve resource allocation while respecting constraints, achieving significant performance improvements in haptic communication systems.

title: Data-driven Context-Aware Traffic Prediction and Modeling for Tactile Internet
authors: Y Yeh, SN Ã–zsert, D Prattichizzo, VS Varma, SE Elayoubi
abstract: We present a novel data-driven approach for predicting and modeling traffic in Tactile Internet scenarios. By leveraging context-aware machine learning techniques, our method accurately forecasts network traffic patterns, enabling more efficient resource management and improved quality of service for haptic applications.

title: AoI-based switching control for safe haptic teleoperation over a wireless network
authors: Yu Yeh, Vineeth S Varma, Salah E Elayoubi
abstract: This work introduces an Age of Information (AoI) based switching control framework for ensuring safe haptic teleoperation over wireless networks. By modeling the system as a Markov jump linear system and incorporating AoI metrics, we develop control strategies that maintain safety constraints while optimizing communication resource usage.

title: Modeling and position control of the HASEL actuator via port-Hamiltonian approacht
authors: Yu Yeh, Nelson Eduardo Cisneros Pinto, Yongxin Wu, Kanty Rabenorosoa, Yann Le Gorreci
abstract: We propose a novel port-Hamiltonian modeling and control approach for Hydraulically Amplified Self-healing Electrostatic (HASEL) actuators. Our framework provides a physically-inspired representation that enables precise position control while preserving the natural dynamics of these soft actuators, with applications in soft robotics and haptic devices.
